summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing overtime staffing details at a correctional facility for the shifts of August 9-10, 2019. It clarifies the number of staff hired for overtime, distinguishing between volunteers and mandated assignments, specifically noting Correctional Officer Noel as the only mandated overtime on August 10.

persons.name: Noel
persons.context: Identified as the only staff member mandated for overtime on August 10, 2019, during the 12 am-8 am shift.

events.title: Overtime Staffing - August 9 Shift
events.description: Overtime shift from 4 pm to 12 am with 6 staff hired for overtime, all of whom were volunteers.

events.title: Overtime Staffing - August 10 Shift
events.description: Overtime shift from 12 am to 8 am with 10 staff hired for overtime; 9 were volunteers and 1 (Correctional Officer Noel) was mandated.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 14, 2019, discussing overtime staffing details for August 9-10, 2019.
On August 9, 2019 (4 pm-12 am), 6 staff were hired for overtime, all volunteers.
On August 10, 2019 (12 am-8 am), 10 staff were hired for overtime, with 9 volunteers and 1 mandated (Correctional Officer Noel).
The correspondence appears to be internal administrative communication regarding correctional facility staffing.
Multiple email addresses are redacted in the 'From', 'To', and 'Cc' fields.
